articles.description: MOTD2 pundit Alan Shearer explains why he is expecting plenty more twists in the Premier League title race with nine games to go.
articles.title: 'Advantage Liverpool - but they are not my title favourites'

articles.description: Two-time Pro Bowl cornerback Vontae Davis has died at the age of 35.
articles.title: Vontae Davis: Two-time Pro Bowl cornerback dies aged 35

articles.description: Media said the number 44 on the shirts resembled the symbol used by WW2-era Nazi SS units.
articles.title: Germany fans banned from buying number 44 kits over Nazi symbolism

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on UB40 drummer & Birmingham City fan Jimmy Brown to predict the outcome of the midweek Premier League games.
articles.title: Sutton's Premier League predictions v UB40 drummer Jimmy Brown

articles.description: Fenerbahce members will decide on Tuesday whether the club will withdraw from the Turkish top-flight Super Lig.
articles.title: Fenerbahce members to vote on Super Lig withdrawal

articles.description: Formula 1 owner Liberty Media buys motorbike racing series MotoGP from its Spanish owners in a deal valued at £3.6bn.
articles.title: MotoGP: F1 owner Liberty Media buys series in deal valued at £3.6bn

articles.description: Former Detroit Lions player Cameron Sutton hands himself in to police to face domestic violence allegations, more than three weeks after an arrest warrant was issued.
articles.title: Cameron Sutton: Former Detroit Lions defensive back hands himself in to police

articles.description: Burnley manager Vincent Kompany says he is "not shying away" from giving feedback to officials and has no "issues" with being fined.
articles.title: Refereeing not good enough this season - Kompany

articles.description: World champion Luke Humphries thrashes Michael van Gerwen 8-1 in the final to win the German Darts Grand Prix.
articles.title: German Darts Grand Prix: Luke Humphries thrashes Michael van Gerwen in Munich

articles.description: Newcastle will reignite interest in Arsenal's Aaron Ramsdale, clubs target Newcastle's Isak & Forest's Gibbs-White, while Real Madrid consider Reece James, plus more.
articles.title: Newcastle reignite Ramsdale interest - Tuesday's gossip
